document_info.title: Chuncheon City Building Ordinance
document_info.description: Local ordinance incorporating regional characteristics such as mountainous terrain and landscape protection.

articles.title: Permit Application and Procedures
articles.national_relation: Building Act Article 11, Building Act Article 14, Building Act Article 16
articles.content: Applications must be submitted to the Mayor. A review is required within 30 days, including deliberation by the Architectural Committee. The same process applies for change permits and reports.

articles.title: Securing Open Space on Site
articles.national_relation: Building Act Article 43, Enforcement Decree Article 27-2
articles.content: Regulations regarding the requirement to secure open space within the building site.

articles.title: Securing Sunlight Rights
articles.national_relation: Building Act Article 61, Enforcement Decree Article 86
articles.content: Regulations ensuring sunlight rights for neighboring buildings and residents.

articles.title: Designation of Buildings Subject to Landscape Review
articles.national_relation: Building Act Article 4, Enforcement Decree Article 5-5
articles.content: Designates specific buildings for landscape review with a particular emphasis on protecting the mountainous landscape of the region.

articles.title: Chuncheon City Building Management Ordinance (Amendment)
articles.national_relation: Building Act Article 35, Building Management Act
articles.content: Scheduled for promulgation on December 31, 2025. Key changes include new support for maintenance of small-scale aging buildings (disaster prevention), strengthened/relaxed demolition permit standards, and simplification of certain agricultural facilities (e.g., livestock barns) from 'permit' to 'report'.
